div.div:
This form is to support technology issues during school closures. If staff or students need a charger or device, please fill out this form completely. If you have a device but need tech support please call (909) 397-4800 ext. 23780. If you select a designated appointment time to pick-up a device or charger, you are confirmed for that time unless you receive a phone call otherwise. For example hotspots and teacher laptops will need to be confirmed, as supplies are limited.
Este formulario es para apoyar problemas de tecnología durante el cierre de la escuelas. Si los estudiantes necesitan un cargador o dispositivo, por favor de completar este formulario.

div.span: We have added a new location to better serve our students.
Hemos agregado una nueva ubicación para servir mejor a nuestros estudiantes.

strong.span: Meal Service for all people under the age of 18 years old:

p.span: Please note during School closure there will be Meal Services Provided (Sack Breakfast & Lunch)

br.span: Meals are being served in a drive -through style, children can do walk- up to get meals. Only cold meals are being served. Meals must be refrigerated within 2 hours from pick up time.

span.span: *Please be advised that the foods contained in this meal may contain the following allergens: Wheat, Soy, Eggs, Milk and Peanuts. This is not an all inclusive list of ingredients.*
Meals are to not be eaten on premises. Children must be present to receive meals.

strong.span: School Sites to pick up food will be as follows:

p.span:
Emerson Middle School 635 Lincoln Ave., Pomona, CA
Ganesha High School 1151 Fairplex Dr., Pomona, CA
Garey High School 321 W. Lexington Ave., Pomona, CA

Golden Springs Elementary 245 S. Ballena Dr., Diamond Bar, CA
Palomares Academy 2211 N. Orange Grove Ave., Pomona, CA
Washington Elementary 975 E. Ninth St., Pomona, CA

br.span: Parents and Guardians: Pomona Unified is committed to the continuity of learning for all students throughout this school closure. PUSD is providing you and your child online resources during this unprecedented time. Below you will find a collection of links to online resources. Many of these pre-approved resources are used in the classroom and will continue to be available to our students. They are also accessible on personal devices. We are encouraging students to continue the use of these PUSD supported online resources during this time. Thank you for your understanding and support.

span.span: Please be advised that Pomona Unified School District will initiate an emergency closure of all district school and work sites starting Monday, March 16, 2020 through Friday, March 27, 2020 out of an abundance of caution as strongly recommended by Los Angeles County Office of Education. Additionally, all PUSD students and staff will begin Spring Break on Monday, March 30, 2020 and return back to PUSD school and work locations on Monday, April 6, 2020. Should you have any further questions, concerns and/or comments, please contact the Public Information Office via
. We will also provide additional information and details via this page as well.

span.style: font-size: 14pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background: white

span.span: Por favor note que el Distrito Escolar Unificado de Pomona iniciará un cierre de emergencia en todas las escuelas y sitios de trabajo del distrito a partir del lunes 16 de marzo de 2020 hasta el 27 de marzo de 2020 por precaución y como lo recomiendó la Oficina de Educación del Condado de Los Ángeles. Además, todos los estudiantes y el personal de PUSD comenzarán las vacaciones de primavera el lunes 30 de marzo de 2020 y regresarán a la escuela y a los lugares de trabajo el lunes 6 de abril de 2020. Si tiene más preguntas, inquietudes y/o comentarios, comuníquese con la Oficina de Información Pública vía
.También proporcionaremos información y detalles adicionales a través de esta página.
